release.action: Added mapping code for dealing with hypotheses and conclusions stored in the InvestigationCollection. Also added some more eager loading for various association ends that needed it. Details of these associations are in the main documentation pages.
Added example classes for inputting/outputting XML.
Created the subversion repository and this documentation. It is all still at an early stage, and needs work. Please contact fuge-devel@lists.sourceforge.net if you have any suggestions or comments.
